content: crochet this stunning wildrose backpack to hold your essentials on all your travels and adventures from music festivals to the beach the modern granny square is centered as a focal point with a variety of crochet stitches and techniques providing plenty of visual interest the sturdy strap is part of the drawstring closure that allows for easy opening and closing of the backpack an interior pocket holds your cell phone and an optional tassel can be added for some pops of color the step-by-step photo tutorial has been broken down into 3 different parts- please reference these in addition to the free pattern * part 1 granny square triangles and backpack sides 2 * part 2 top and bottom edging & bottom base of backpack 3 * part 3 inner cell phone pocket strap and tassel 4 join our wildrose backpack crochet-along facebook group here 5 use the hashtags #wildrosebackpack and #wildrosebackpackcal on social media 1 https //www etsy com/ca/listing/703282991/wildrose-backpack-crochet-pattern 2 https //www allaboutami com/wildrose-backpack-part-1/ 3 https //www allaboutami com/wildrose-backpack-part-2/ 4 https //www allaboutami com/wildrose-backpack-part-3/ 5 https //www facebook com/groups/2178946678807258/
